definitions.definition: The act of retiring , or the state of being retired .
A place to which one retires.
A call sounded on a bugle , announcing to skirmishers that they are to retire, or fall back.
examples: At the retire , the cavalry fell back.

main_definition: ( rare ) The act of retiring , or the state of being retired .
secondary_definitions: A place to which one retires.
( dated ) A call sounded on a bugle , announcing to skirmishers that they are to retire, or fall back.
